question: Can discharge destinations be accurately predicted using the Risk Assessment and Prediction Tool (RAPT)?
ideal_answer: Yes. The Risk Assessment and Prediction Tool (RAPT) appears to be a valuable predictor of discharge destination after orthopedic surgery and neurosurgical procedures.
